Name: Failling Capsule
About the game: About This Game 'Use your controls and your head to escape!' You use your head and controls to escape. 'Failling Capsule' is a puzzle game that requires mouse control. Sometimes you have to go through the steps with your own control, and sometimes you have to go through the steps with your head. As you move on to the next level, new features may emerge, or they may become more difficult. It consists of 20 levels in easy mode, 10 levels in normal mode, and 1 level in hard mode. Now test your limits. Disclaimer The developer will not compensate if the mouse or keyboard is damaged while playing the game. Control Use the right mouse button to move. Press the spacebar to use the item. Requirements 'Failling Capsule' can work on any Windows computer with working 3D graphics is sufficient.
